entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
